description.en-NG: Exercício cardiovascular completo ótimo para aquecimento e queima de calorias. Mantenha os movimentos controlados e o ritmo constante.
description.fr-CI: Exercice cardiovasculaire complet excellent pour l'échauffement et brûler des calories. Maintenez les mouvements contrôlés et le rythme constant.
description.en-GH: Complete cardiovascular exercise great for warming up and burning calories. Keep movements controlled and rhythm constant.
description.en-KE: Complete cardiovascular exercise great for warming up and burning calories. Keep movements controlled and rhythm constant.
description.en-ZA: Complete cardiovascular exercise great for warming up and burning calories. Keep movements controlled and rhythm constant.

instructions.en-NG:
1. Fique em pé com os pés juntos e braços ao lado do corpo
2. Pule abrindo as pernas para os lados
3. Simultaneamente levante os braços acima da cabeça
4. Retorne à posição inicial pulando
5. Repita o movimento de forma ritmada
instructions.fr-CI:
1. Tenez-vous debout avec les pieds joints et les bras sur le côté du corps
2. Sautez en ouvrant les jambes sur les côtés
3. Levez simultanément les bras au-dessus de la tête
4. Revenez à la position initiale en sautant
5. Répétez le mouvement de manière rythmée
instructions.en-GH:
1. Stand with feet together and arms at your sides
2. Jump spreading legs to the sides
3. Simultaneously raise arms above your head
4. Return to starting position by jumping
5. Repeat the movement rhythmically
instructions.en-KE:
1. Stand with feet together and arms at your sides
2. Jump spreading legs to the sides
3. Simultaneously raise arms above your head
4. Return to starting position by jumping
5. Repeat the movement rhythmically
instructions.en-ZA:
1. Stand with feet together and arms at your sides
2. Jump spreading legs to the sides
3. Simultaneously raise arms above your head
4. Return to starting position by jumping
5. Repeat the movement rhythmically

description.en-NG: Exercício de força para parte superior do corpo, focando peito, ombros e tríceps.
description.fr-CI: Exercice de force pour le haut du corps, ciblant la poitrine, les épaules et les triceps.
description.en-GH: Upper body strength exercise targeting chest, shoulders and triceps.
description.en-KE: Upper body strength exercise targeting chest, shoulders and triceps.
description.en-ZA: Upper body strength exercise targeting chest, shoulders and triceps.

instructions.en-NG:
1. Deite-se de bruços no chão
2. Coloque as mãos no chão, na largura dos ombros
3. Mantenha o corpo reto da cabeça aos pés
4. Empurre o corpo para cima estendendo os braços
5. Desça controladamente até quase tocar o peito no chão
6. Repita o movimento
instructions.fr-CI:
1. Allongez-vous face contre terre
2. Placez vos mains au sol, à la largeur des épaules
3. Gardez le corps droit de la tête aux pieds
4. Poussez le corps vers le haut en étendant les bras
5. Descendez de manière contrôlée jusqu'à presque toucher la poitrine au sol
6. Répétez le mouvement
instructions.en-GH:
1. Lie face down on the floor
2. Place hands on the ground, shoulder-width apart
3. Keep body straight from head to feet
4. Push body up by extending arms
5. Lower in a controlled manner until chest almost touches the ground
6. Repeat the movement
instructions.en-KE:
1. Lie face down on the floor
2. Place hands on the ground, shoulder-width apart
3. Keep body straight from head to feet
4. Push body up by extending arms
5. Lower in a controlled manner until chest almost touches the ground
6. Repeat the movement
instructions.en-ZA:
1. Lie face down on the floor
2. Place hands on the ground, shoulder-width apart
3. Keep body straight from head to feet
4. Push body up by extending arms
5. Lower in a controlled manner until chest almost touches the ground
6. Repeat the movement

description.en-NG: Exercício para membros inferiores focando quadríceps, glúteos e posteriores de coxa.
description.fr-CI: Exercice pour les membres inférieurs ciblant les quadriceps, les fessiers et les ischio-jambiers.
description.en-GH: Lower body exercise targeting quadriceps, glutes and hamstrings.
description.en-KE: Lower body exercise targeting quadriceps, glutes and hamstrings.
description.en-ZA: Lower body exercise targeting quadriceps, glutes and hamstrings.

instructions.en-NG:
1. Fique em pé com os pés na largura dos ombros
2. Mantenha as costas retas e olhe para frente
3. Desça dobrando os joelhos como se fosse sentar
4. Desça até as coxas ficarem paralelas ao chão
5. Empurre pelos calcanhares para subir
6. Retorne à posição inicial
instructions.fr-CI:
1. Tenez-vous debout avec les pieds à la largeur des épaules
2. Gardez le dos droit et regardez devant
3. Descendez en pliant les genoux comme si vous alliez vous asseoir
4. Descendez jusqu'à ce que les cuisses soient parallèles au sol
5. Poussez par les talons pour remonter
6. Revenez à la position initiale
instructions.en-GH:
1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
2. Keep back straight and look forward
3. Lower by bending knees as if sitting down
4. Lower until thighs are parallel to the ground
5. Push through heels to rise
6. Return to starting position
instructions.en-KE:
1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
2. Keep back straight and look forward
3. Lower by bending knees as if sitting down
4. Lower until thighs are parallel to the ground
5. Push through heels to rise
6. Return to starting position
instructions.en-ZA:
1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
2. Keep back straight and look forward
3. Lower by bending knees as if sitting down
4. Lower until thighs are parallel to the ground
5. Push through heels to rise
6. Return to starting position
